posts.post_title: 1905 New York Giants SGC 2 World Series Champ Post Card Christy Mathewson
posts.post_content: I'd take $500 net to me via PayPal.  Message me if you're interested: [url]martyesullivan@yahoo.com[/url]
Any interest at all?  Offers?  Feel free to email me at [url]martyesullivan@yahoo.com[/url] I'd love to find this beauty a new home!
